msbt.message: Is this what I think it is? A real ?Oh, I've been DYING to get my hands on one of these. I have to try it on right now!
You should!
Can it wait?
Ohwell, how about that It's .You know, I'm not sure this sort of thing suits me. But it was a gift, I suppose
Aww, you should try it.
You're right.
?! Why, I'm wearing the very same thing right now!That's rather unfortunate, isn't it? Although, of course, the style is spot on.
Well, thank you for humoring me! Alright, give me just a moment.
Oh, I suppose so. Sorry about thatâ€”I just get so excited about new clothes!
You know what? You're right. There's no harm in just seeing how it looks. Hold on a moment!
Of course I'm right! No one knows my sense of fashion better than I do.I feel bad for , but I'm afraid this item will be used as a pair of pajamas.
Well, how do I look?
It looks great!
Well...
Do you really think so? You're not just flattering me? Well, thank you very much.
Oh dear
It's fine, it's fine!
Hoo boy...
Really?<10_4 /> Well, if you say so, I'll give it a shot. I hope you're not joking around
Let's just pretend this never happened, shall we?
When one is a fashion icon, one should be able to pull off ANY sort of outfit. Clearly I have some work to do
Well, I should have known that would pick out something fabulous. That's so her.
You know, and I don't always see eye to eye on fashion, but she's done well here.
I expected something fabulous from and she delivered. That's all there is to it.
Wow, really outdid herself this time. I didn't know she had it in her!
I can hardly believe that picked this out. Are you SURE?
So you're telling me that picked this out? By himself?<10_4 /> It's not even spandex!
Did really pick this out? C'mon, someone helped him, right?
That's for you. It's perfect, right down to the size. He never ceases to amaze me.
went out and picked up such a thoughtful gift for me. She's such a sweetheart. I guess I should go apologize to her as well so we can finally put all of this behind us.
I guess was pretty upset about our fightI was quite annoyed with her, but I suppose I'm equally to blame. I'll go apologize to her too.
I suppose and I can both be a bit stubbornbut this shows me that she's willing to work on things. I should step it up and apologize to her too.
To think got me such a nice present even when she was mad at me It's a tough pill to swallow, but I suppose I owe her an apology too.
I still can't believe that and I got into an argument in the first place! And then he got me such a nice gift I'm being childish. I should go apologize to him at once!
I can't wrap my head around the idea that got this for me If he's that upset on my account, maybe I'm partially to blame. I'll go talk to him and apologize.
I suppose must have been feeling pretty badly to go to these lengths. And he says he doesn't have feelings! Well, I'll go make amends with him right away.
Well, of course picked out something incredibly fashionable for me But it's not like him to offer a mea culpa like this. He must be feeling really bad. I'll go apologize.
Well, it's the thought that counts, and was thinking of me. That makes me happier than any piece of clothing could!
Well, I suppose got her message across loud and clear. I was being a little stubborn. I'll go and talk to her now so we can make up.
Well, I finally feel like I get what was trying to tell me. Fighting like this is too stressful and we need to make up immediately. I'll go have a chat with her.
Well, I got the message. made it loud and clear. We can both be just the tiniest bit stubborn, don't you think? Don't answer that.
That sure knows how to deliver a message.I guess I was being pretty stubborn, and I hurt her feelings. I think I owe her an apology.
I feel so badly that poor went to these lengths to apologize to me. I probably owe HIM an apology too. I was being childish.
It doesn't matter what silly thing gave me. What matters is that he's thinking of me. And here all I thought he cared about were his biceps. Well, I'll go hash it all out with him in person.
Well, in any case, I appreciate the message is trying to send me. I suppose that cantankerous exterior really does hide a heart of gold. I'll go apologize to him right away.
Well, even though he missed the mark, knows his way around a designer label. I appreciate that he's trying to make up with me, so I'll go see if I can't put this all behind us.
